nodes.documentation:
@dev `Owned` is a base level contract that assigns an `owner` that can be
  later changed
nodes.name: Owned

nodes.documentation:
@dev `owner` is the only address that can call a function with this
 modifier
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @notice The Constructor assigns the message sender to be `owner`

nodes.name: changeOwner

nodes.documentation:
@notice The owner is able to add new admin
 @param _newAdmin Address of new admin
nodes.name: addAdmin

nodes.documentation:
@notice Only owner is able to remove admin
 @param _admin Address of current admin
nodes.name: removeAdmin

nodes.documentation:
@dev register
 @param newUsers - Array of users to add to the whitelist
nodes.name: register

@dev deregister
 @param bannedUsers - Array of users to remove from the whitelist

nodes.documentation:
@dev deauthoriseMaker

devdoc.details: `Owned` is a base level contract that assigns an `owner` that can be  later changed

params._newOwner: The address of the new owner. 0x0 can be used to create  an unowned neutral vault, however that cannot be undone

changeOwner(address).notice: `owner` can step down and assign some other address to this role

methods.constructor: The Constructor assigns the message sender to be `owner`
